title-group.article-title: An Analysis of the Flotation Cost of Corporate Quasi-Equity Securities, 1971-72

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1975 Board of Regents of the University of Wisconsin System

abstract.p: This study examines the flotation cost of preferred stock and convertible securities using data heretofore unavailable in machine readable form. Issuer size and type of distribution are key variables affecting the cost of tapping the capital markets with quasi-equity securities.
